vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.15;
son of: Ishmael (H3458);
brother of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305) and Mahalath (H4258); also called Nodab at 1Ch.5.19;
Another name of qe.de.mah (קֵ֑דְמָה "Kedemah" H6929)
§ Nodab = "nobility"
an Arab tribe probably descended from Nodab, son of Ishmael and grandson of Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
挪答人 这个陽性專有名詞 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 "高貴"
一個阿拉伯民族 #代上 5:19|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
挪答人 这个阳性专有名词 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 "高贵"
一个阿拉伯民族 #代上 5:19|
